## BaleKit
A tool for developing bots in Bale messenger!
## Quick Example
```python
from balekit import Bot
app = Bot("TOKEN")
async def main():
    await app.send_message(1234567890,"Hello World!")
app.run(main)
```

## Installing

```bash
pip install balekit==0.0.3
```
